featured.text: It is a tailored garment that is wrapped around the wearer’s body at the waist starting from one side, around the front and back and across the front again to the opposite side.
The most recognizable piece of clothing is the shúkà, a sheet of fabric worn wrapped around the body.

definition.zh_def: 包裹，包裝或覆蓋某物的行為或狀態。
definition.en_def: To cover or enclose something in a material, often for protection or presentation.
definition.example: She decided to wrap the gift in colorful paper.
